Robert Anderson (silent film actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_Anderson_(silent_film_actor) 0 Robert Christian Anderson (July 22, 1890 - June 25, 1963) was an American actor of Danish birth who appeared in silent films. Robert_Christian_Anderson ( July_22_,_1890 - June_25_,_1963 ) was an_American_actor of Danish_birth who appeared in silent_films .
